CodeBlock.Content:
Welcome to the forum

Please use this page to speak with your fellow bank users. There may be some delay before you see your post as all posts must be validated by an administrator.

Post a New Comment

Item.Value: SELECT Users.userName, Comments.title, Comments.body, Comments.postTime FROM Comments INNER JOIN Users ON Comments.userID = Users.userID WHERE Comments.Validated = 1
